isRotationPossible

protected boolean isRotationPossible(boolean[][] desiredAllocation,
                                     int xShift,
                                     int yShift)
Whether a rotation of the current Stone is possible considering the provided conditions.

Parameters:
desiredAllocation - the allocation which the stone would have after the rotation
xShift - the number of cells that the stone has to move in x direction relative to the previous orientation to ensure a smooth rotation (may be negative)
yShift - the number of cells that the stone has to move in y direction relative to the previous orientation to ensure a smooth rotation (may be negative)
Returns:
, if a rotation under the provided conditions is possible
